title: MediBuddy-Online Dr, Lab, Meds
description:
MediBuddy is India's largest digital healthcare platform. Help is just an app away. You can download MediBuddy for all your healthcare needs.

Services offered:

  • Online & In-clinic Doctor Consultations
  • Online Medicines Delivery
  • Lab Tests
  • Health Checks
  • MediBuddy Gold
  • Surgery Care
  • Insurance
  • Other Healthcare Services

Doctor Consultations

Get access to world-class doctors from the comfort of your home. Book appointments, consult via teleconsultation and visit clinics with our doctor app. Enjoy the convenience of online & offline doctor consultation anytime, anywhere!

Talk to a Doctor Online

Gynecology: Irregular periods, fungal infections, period cramps, pregnancy and breast-feeding issues.

Mental Health: Anxiety, depression, counselling, psychiatry

Dermatology: Acne, dry skin, skin rashes

Cardiology: heart health issues

Sexology: Private and confidential sexual health issues

Hair Scalp Care: Hairfall, dandruff, receding hairline

General Physician: Cold, cough, fever, headache

Pediatrics: fever, child's nutrition, bed wetting

Gastroenterology: Stomach issues, digestive problems and disorders

Diabetes: Manage and control diabetes issues

Other Specialities: Weight Management,orthopedics,neurology,cancer advice

Order Medicines Online from MediBuddy

Get your medicines online with our pharmacy app! Our app offers easy medicine delivery, medical advice, and medicare discounts. Get your prescribed medicines online with our fast and convenient online medical services.

Let us count the reasons for choosing MediBuddy

  • Up to 15% discount on your order
  • 95% of Indian Pin codes Serviced
  • Free and Safe Door Delivery
  • Genuine and Trusted Pharmacies

Book A Lab Test

Get the best and most reliable lab tests online in certified Labs. We offer wellness tests, full body checkups, diagnostic tests, and blood tests. Book online to experience hassle-free lab tests and get accurate results.

Types of Lab tests included:

  • Diabetes test
  • Kidney test
  • Cardiac Markers
  • Thyroid Tests
  • cbc test
  • ultrasound Test
  • double marker test
  • vdrl test
  • And other lab tests...

MediBuddy Gold - Unlimited Online Doctor Consultation

With MediBuddy Gold, we aim to provide essential healthcare for you and your family.

  • Unlimited consultations with specialist MD doctors
  • Available for the entire family (4 adults and 2 children)
  • Consultations across 18 specialties in 16 Indian languages

Activate MediBuddy Gold Subscription:

  1. Log in to the MediBuddy app
  2. Click on the "MediBuddy Gold"
  3. On the Gold activation screen click on 'Buy MediBuddy Gold' and activate your subscription.

Surgery Care

With MediBuddy you can book your surgery and get end-to-end surgery care.

Home Healthcare

Book healthcare professionals for post-operative care at home, for physiotherapy, physical exercise and lifestyle aid.

Dental

Take care of your Dental needs with just a click. You can schedule appointments with a dental professional near you on MediBuddy.

INSURANCE AND TPA RELATED SERVICES

  • Access, view, and download your Medi Assist eCard
  • Cashless Healthcare
  • Locate Network Hospitals
  • Track Claims in Real-Time

Privacy Policy :

https://www.medibuddy.in/privacy-policy

Terms of Use :

https://www.medibuddy.in/terms

Disclosure of Permissions:

https://www.medibuddy.in/policyDisclosure.html
